home.text: Coming into this game, Deportivo Alavés has picked up 1 points from the last 5 games, both home and away. That's 0.2 points per game on average. BTTS has landed in an intriguing 3 of those games. Deportivo Alavés has scored 3 times in the last 5 fixtures.

Real Betis's defence will have to be at their best today if they're to stop Deportivo Alavés from scoring. The home side has scored in the last 3 games in front of their own fans. They have failed to score in 2 home matches this season.
Can Deportivo Alavés turn this around? They have not won in the last 5 games coming into this, with 1 draws and 4 defeats.

Things have not been going that well in front of goal for Deportivo Alavés recently, with the side failing to score in 2 of the last 5 games. Will the manager change his tactics today, or throw in another forward?

Deportivo Alavés has fired blanks in 8 games this season. That's 40% of games where they have not been able to find the back of the net. Do they need a new forward? In the last 5 games, they have scored an intriguing 3 goals.
In the last 5 matches for Deportivo Alavés, 3 of those games has ended with both teams scoring. This season 10 matches (50% of all matches) involving Deportivo Alavés has seen BTTS landing.

away.text: Coming into this game, Real Betis has picked up 8 points from the last 5 games, both home and away. That's 1.6 points per game on average. BTTS has landed in just 2 of those games. Real Betis has scored 8 times in the last 5 fixtures.
Real Betis has put together a good run of form and has now gone 2 games without defeat.
It's possible we will see a couple of goals here, with the last 4 games for Real Betis ending with 2 goals or more being scored.
Real Betis has kept 3 clean sheets in the last 5 games, conceding 6 goals during this period. Overall this season, their defence has kept a clean sheet on 7 occasions.
Real Betis will be looking to keep up the momentum today against Deportivo Alavés, having lost just 1 game from the last 5. They have won 2 and drawn 2
Just 2 of the last 5 games for Real Betis has ended with both teams scoring. They have won 2 of those 5 games. Overall, BTTS has landed in 12/20 games for Real Betis this season.
It's likely that Real Betis will score today, as they have netted in the last 4 games coming into this one and have scored 8 goals in the last five games.
